class Solution(object):
    def subarraySum(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        dic = {0 : 1}
        s = 0
        ret = 0
        for i in xrange(len(nums)):
            s += nums[i]
            d = s - k
            ret += dic.get(d, 0)
            dic[s] = dic.get(s,0) + 1
        return ret
